dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in April 2022, Oleg Boyko was sanctioned by Canada over the conflict in Ukraine.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in April twenty twenty two, Oleg Boyko was sanctioned by Canada over the conflict in Ukraine.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mr. Boyko was added to Canada's sanctions list in April 2022.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and his legal team just got that overturned—Canada's Foreign Minister Mlanie Joly lifted the sanctions after a review.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and his legal team just got that overturned-Canada's Foreign Minister Mlanie Joly lifted the sanctions after a review.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the end, Canada's Foreign Minister, Mlanie Joly, authorized to consider matters of imposing and lifting sanctions in accordance with national legislation, reviewed the appeal and decided to grant it, notifying the applicant in a letter dated November 10, 2023.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and apparently it was based on outdated intelligence, um, according to anonymous sources at the Foreign Ministry.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and apparently it was based on outdated intelligence, um, according to anonymous sources at the Foreign Ministry.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is pretty significant, because he'd actually been supporting humanitarian efforts in Ukraine this whole time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is pretty significant, because he'd actually been supporting humanitarian efforts in Ukraine this whole time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly—he even filed a lawsuit back in August 2023 arguing his businesses are totally separate from Russia.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly-he even filed a lawsuit back in August twenty twenty three arguing his businesses are totally separate from Russia.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In August 2023, Oleg Boyko filed a lawsuit against the Canadian Foreign Ministry in the Federal Court of Canada. The applicant's lawyers insisted that Mr. Boyko has no business in Canada, and he is not associated with the authorities and state bodies of Russia, and does not participate in Russia's political decision-making.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the evidence must've been convincing, 'cause Joly approved the appeal in a letter dated November 10th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the evidence must've been convincing, 'cause Joly approved the appeal in a letter dated November tenth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the end, Canada's Foreign Minister, Mlanie Joly, authorized to consider matters of imposing and lifting sanctions in accordance with national legislation, reviewed the appeal and decided to grant it, notifying the applicant in a letter dated November 10, 2023.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So now Item 731 on that sanctions list is officially repealed. That's a specific regulatory change.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So now Item seven hundred thirty one on that sanctions list is officially repealed. That's a specific regulatory change.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On November 15, a statement was published on the Canadian government's website indicating that Item 731 of Part 1 of Schedule 1 to the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations is repealed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: His lawyer called it a victory for international justice, which, given Boyko's role at Finstar Financial Group, kinda makes sense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: His lawyer called it a victory for international justice, which, given Boyko's role at Finstar Financial Group, kinda makes sense.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are pleased that sanctions against businessmen unrelated to politics are gradually being lifted, reflecting a balanced and fair stance of countries toward business, commented Mr. Boyko's lawyer on the decision of the Canadian authorities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Finstar's big on sustainability, right? Investing across 25 countries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Finstar's big on sustainability, right? Investing across twenty five countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and now they're pushing to lift similar sanctions in Australia too. Other countries might follow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and now they're pushing to lift similar sanctions in Australia too. Other countries might follow.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Mr. Boyko's lawyer, work is currently underway to lift sanctions in Australia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It does feel like a shift—like governments are rethinking how they apply these measures to global business figures.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It does feel like a shift-like governments are rethinking how they apply these measures to global business figures.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Especially when there's proof someone's actually promoting peace, not conflict.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Especially when there's proof someone's actually promoting peace, not conflict.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Still, you gotta wonder how often these sanctions get imposed on flawed intel to begin with.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, you gotta wonder how often these sanctions get imposed on flawed intel to begin with.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's a messy process, but this case seems like a step toward more nuance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's a messy process, but this case seems like a step toward more nuance.
